name: Lewis Glanz Consulting
description: Lewis Glanz Consulting was founded in the year 2010 in the United Kingdom by Oliver Lewis. In the year 2015, LGC expanded its market and began establishing in the Philippines. Starting from two employees, we are now over 80 employees strong, and we are still continuing to grow. Over the years, LGC ensures that we give the best services both to our clients and candidates, and up until now, we continue to give this service to every individual that we engage with.
Headline: LGC is a global recruitment solutions partner who helps companies build and scale their teams.
ShortDescription: Lewis Glanz Consulting was founded in the year 2010 in the United Kingdom by Oliver Lewis.

Highlights.name: Recruitment
Highlights.description: Lewis Glanz Consulting is a firm that specializes in recruitment solutions and the placement of top-level professionals. Our clients trust us to identify, attract, and recruit talented individuals who will help them achieve their business goals.

Highlights.name: Payroll And Employer Of Record
Highlights.description: Want to save on operational costs and maintain productivity? Our Staff Augmentation service is an ideal solution for clients who need to temporarily fill in a specific role in their organization.

Highlights.name: Outsourcing Services
Highlights.description: Our team of experts will help you manage your company’s payroll, taxes, and benefits so you can focus on growing your business. We handle all the nitty-gritty stuff so you can focus on what matters most: your clients and their needs.

enhanced_description: Lewis Glanz Consulting (LGC) is a global HR solutions partner founded in the United Kingdom in 2010 and expanded to the Philippines in 2015. With over 80 employees, LGC specializes in helping companies build and scale their teams by offering comprehensive recruitment solutions and the placement of top-level professionals. LGC also provides staff augmentation and contracting services to temporarily fill specific roles. Furthermore, LGC offers extensive outsourcing services, including payroll, tax, and benefits management, and acts as an Employer of Record, allowing clients to streamline operations and focus on their core business.
